mutation {
  grantAccessToDataproduct(
    dataproductID: "{{ .pii_dataproduct_id }}"
    expires:"2048-12-24T00:00:00Z"
    subject: "all-users@nav.no"
    subjectType: group,
  ) {
    id
  }
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.grantAccessToDataproduct.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
  "errors": [
    {
      "message": "not allowed to grant all-users access to dataproduct containing pii",
      "path": [
        "grantAccessToDataproduct"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "data": null
}
